name: hungrynauts
description:
Compete in the ultimate battle for burgers... somewhere in outer space... and satisfy hungrynauts' insatiable hunger... but look out! You are not the only hungrynaut being hungry!

The poor, poor hungrynauts are so hungry... so hungry they cannot even jump anymore. So poor... Fortunately they have their faithful - and also very stretchy - companion GRACS-9.81 (short for GravityChangingSuit) which enables the poor, poor hungrynauts to change their gravity.

"hungrynauts" is a fast-paced, bite-sized local multiplayer game for 2 players and supports controls on one keyboard or using 2 controllers (we recommend controllers ;) )

Note: There is NO SINGLEPLAYER mode

Install instructions

On MacOS: Use right click to open the .dmg file. Confirm the dialog by pressing the open button.

On Windows: Unzip the download. Copy the included .exe and .pck files wherever you want. Make sure to always keep these two files in the same folder!

Demo & Full Game

The browser-version of the game (embedded at the top of this page) is a demo - including all features, but limited to 3 levels.

The download versions contain 10 levels (at the moment of release... more might be on the way ;) ).

Tools & Credits

"hungrynauts" was created by Pixel Sprouts (Marco "Mokka" Dörflinger and Peter "Pedro" Fußl) using Godot Engine 3.2.3 and Aseprite.

Assets: Kenney 1-Bit Platformer Pack created/distributed by Kenney (www.kenney.nl).

Font: Silkscreen created by Jason Kottke (jason@kottke.org).

Shader: Godot 3 2D CRT Shader created by Xavier Gómez Gosálbez (a.k.a. hiulit).
